entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo @FadingTeacher Thank you for your exceptional calm + unifying leadership, @NYGovCuomo. I grew up in Buffalo; your dad was my governor. He must be basking in pride.🙌 Thanks, too, for sharing so clearly abt #COVID19 in NY - we locked down the Bay Area early and were spared the worst as a result.
